manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Gift That Kids Love and Will Love You For Need a smart idea for a gift for boys or girls? This set is a winner for any gifting occasion. Kids love constructing their own inventive and different creations, time and again.

STEM Toys that Help Build Essential Skills for the Future Searching for quality STEM toys? This unique building set fosters teamwork, problem solving, and patience, as well as important math and engineering skills.

A Hit with All Ages Whether you're looking for cool toys for 4 to 14 year old boys or girls, a clever gift for toddlers or a toy the whole family can enjoy together, these wooden planks offer a quality set that's great for home & Montessori style classrooms.
Certified for Safe Play Enjoy our educational toys with peace of mind — they're certified for safe play. These wooden planks are BPA Free and the wood is smooth and splinter free.

A Great Gift for a Great Kid Looking for a great birthday gift, Christmas present or 'just because' toy for a boy or girl in your life? Want to give them a fun toy they will play with again and again? Want a gift that you will feel good about giving? This classic building set is for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun!
reviews.reviewText: Great Building Toys!I wasn't sure about these as they are just plain wood planks but I ended up taking a chance on them. I'm so glad I did! They were a hit with 3 kids - a 4 and 10 year old boy and their 8 year old sister. Mom and grandpa even got in on the fun! I'm sure this will be a toy we end up playing with as a family often.I always like to see Pros and Cons when I read reviews so here is mine for these wood toys:Pros:- Kids love them (that's probably the biggest)- It keeps kids away from a screen for a while.- They can build anything they want with these. The 10 year old boy has decided he wants to build the Washington Monument next, the 4 year old wants to build a fence and barn for his dinosaurs.- The price was really good compared to other similar sets- It's a quiet toy - no bells, no loud noises and no batteries required.- I like the idea of them playing with a classic toy that's simple and using their brain and imagination to come up with something creative.Cons:- It doesn't have directions but it wasn't an issue as almost immediately the kids took inspiration from some of the pictures on the box and started to build. Besides, kind of the whole point of these is for the kids to figure out what to build and how to do it. Classic toys are classic for a reason. I like the idea of kids having to figure things out for themselves and not have everything spelled out and handed to them.- This set doesn't come with a bag but it isn't that big of a deal as the kids just put them back in the box. When that gets old for them I'll dig up a bag for them to use.Overall:I'm really glad I bought these. They are really fun building toys that kids and adults enjoy playing with. With all the different kids parties we have to attend this is going to be my go-to kids birthday present from now on as I know it's a gift all ages will like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for building fine motor skills!
reviews.reviewText: The simplicity of the wooden planks is not only easy for any child to use and play with, but it also creates a platform for the imagination. I know my 6 yr old son loves to build fortresses with it for his rob lox toys to hide in, but I see that there is careful thought put in how he builds everything. He is the architect and I am the helper. However, I have found myself sitting there just as focused as he is trying to build my own masterpiece. The wooden planks are extremely sturdy, yet light enough that they do not pose a risk if they were to fall. I will also be using them when doing math problems, as it can also be used as a visual in addition and subtraction problems. I would highly recommend this toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the name brand ones
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely fantastic blocks. My oldest son said his classroom had them, but they were some name brand. This brand cost half as much and got twice as many. They've been perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great STEM toy
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these on Prime Day for my STEM classroom. They are the same as the name brand wooden planks that many STEM classrooms have, however, they are much more affordable. I was able to purchase many more with my budget than if I were purchasing the name brand. The students absolutely love building with these!
